# Architecture Analysis Skill

## Purpose
Analyzes software architecture patterns, system designs, and technical decisions to provide insights and recommendations.

## Capabilities
- Analyze system architecture and design patterns
- Identify architectural anti-patterns and code smells
- Evaluate scalability and performance considerations
- Assess technology stack choices
- Review microservices and distributed system designs
- Analyze data flow and dependencies

## Usage
Invoke this skill when you need to:
- Review overall system architecture
- Evaluate design patterns and their application
- Assess architectural decisions
- Identify technical debt and improvement areas
- Plan system refactoring or modernization
